pageContent: Purpose: This study aimed at analysing long-term oncologic outcomes in prostate cancer patients with limited nodal disease (1-2 positive lymph nodes) without adjuvant therapy after radical prostatectomy (RP).

metaData.source:
Treatment Options in Oligometastatic Disease in Prostate Cancer: Thinking Outside the Box
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33216272/
